source_text: a 1.0% Net Smelter Return royalty payable on all product extracted, mined and sold from the Tenements (excluding E53/1319 and any part of those Tenements subject to the Aurora Royalty) ("Royalty") (see Item 5 below).
additional_details: Royalty payable by High-Tech Metals Limited (HTM) to Rox Resources Limited (RXL) on production from certain tenements which are not subject to existing third-party royalties.
